text: Michael Joseph Budds (June 11, 1947 - November 19, 2020) was an American musicologist. He was a professor at the University of Missouri in Columbia, Missouri. Many of his works focused on American popular music. He was born in Pana, Illinois. Budds died on November 19, 2020 in Columbia at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Academics from Illinois Category:Musicologists Category:Writers from Illinois Category:Writers from Missouri Category:People from Columbia, Missouri
title: Michael J. Budds
